verses.name: 2 Chronicles 32:1
verses.text: After these things, and the establishment thereof, Sennacherib king of Assyria came, and entered into Judah, and encamped against the fenced cities, and thought to win them for himself.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 32:2
verses.text: And when Hezekiah saw that Sennacherib was come, and that he was purposed to fight against Jerusalem,

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 32:3
verses.text: He took counsel with his princes and his mighty men to stop the waters of the fountains which were without the city: and they did help him.
